description: This is a full-featured Nuxt 4 project with TypeScript, Composition API, Pinia, i18n, SASS, and ESLint.

features.title: Technologies Used
features.nuxt4: Nuxt 4 - Latest version with new app/ directory structure
features.typescript: TypeScript - Full type safety and IntelliSense
features.pinia: Pinia - Modern state management with Composition API
features.sass: SASS - Powerful CSS preprocessor with variables
